title: Monk's Belt
summaries: The Monk's Belt is a Hardmode accessory that increases the maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. The Monk's Belt is dropped by Ogres during the Old One's Army event with a 1/6 (16.67%) / 1/4 (25%) chance during Tier 2, and a 1/12 (8.33%) chance during Tier 3.
